verbs.description: if [ARG0: god] [ARGM-ADV: only] [V: made] [ARG1: male female] what about intersex i think i ’ve heard the phrase in the beginning god made them male and female a hundred times in response to the sex gender discussions of our time the phrase works like a trump card to win a theological discussion on anything from lgbtq issues to how target should organize their toys however each time i read more isaiah marquette university target augustine gordon conwell theological seminary eve jesus life in male dr defranza dr megan defranza
